attributes.action: Protect cars from hitting trees like in Christmas Day tragedy on M6
attributes.additional_details: There are too many deaths on the roads due to the lack of crash barriers stopping vehicles hitting trees and/or crossing the central reservation. On Christmas Day 2012 at least 5 lives were lost when cars left the road and hit a tree. 3 deaths and 2 seriously injured in A3 coach crash on September 10. September 21 car crossed central reservation A56 Accrington and crashed into van going the other way due to lack of a barrier.
